name: Kate Chadderton Soft Shell Vest
description:
The Kate Chadderton Logo pops on this black soft shell vest by StormTech! Kate's custom logo in her signature blue thread adorns this fleece-lined soft shell garment that will keep you warm but mobile all winter long!

Ladies Sizes XS to XL

name: Kate Chadderton Logo Fleece
description:
StormTech's high quality fleece in Kate's signature blue color, emblazoned with the large Kate Chadderton custom logo! 

This is a full zip fleece, and it will quickly become your winter favorite, because it is VERY warm. 

Sizes XS through XXL

$120

name: Kate Chadderton Logo Saddle Pad
description: Kate's spectacular logo on a crisp, white all purpose or dressage saddle pad.

name: Kate Chadderton Logo Polo
description:
Elite Eventer Kate Chadderton's style is captured in her unique logo, emblazoned on a high quality moisture-wicking polo shirt in her signature "Kate Blue." 

This logo, designed by Artforms of Maryland, is taken from a photograph of Kate riding Three Star event horse Collection Pass, aka, Cole. 

The polo also comes in white with Kate Blue embroidery!

Sizes Ladies XS to XL.

name: POM Dressage Soft-Shell Vest
description:
This soft-shell vest has all of the bells and whistles! Manufactured by the amazing Canadian Sports Apparel Maker, StormTech, this vest boasts a breathable outer shell of 2-ply bonded microfiber, zippered pockets with durable rubber pulls, and an adjustable draw cord at the hem. 

It comes in Ladies sizes XS to XL, and in Birch, Black, Coal, Navy, and Red!

With the beautiful POM Dressage logo on the back, this vest is priced at a very reasonable $115

name: POM Dressage Microfleece-Lined Jacket
description:
This StormTech jacket has it all! Attractive and functional, and yes easily embroiderable too! This jacket has a Water-Resistant Tactel Nylon Outshell, micro-fleece lining, an interior draft flap, zippered front pickets, adjustable VelcroÂ® closure cuffs, large hand-warmer pockets, and an elastic drawcord at the hem. It also has that all-important interior pocket for your cell phone! 

Adorned with Jaclyn Sicoli's beautiful new Peace of Mind Dressage logo, this jacket is a total bargain at Just $105 with embroidery. 

Sizes are women's XS to XL. In addition to this Cool Blue color, this jacket also comes in Black, Navy, Red, and Chalk White! 

StormTech has a limited supply of these jackets this season, so order today!

name: Pierre Wear Micro-fleece Lined Jacket
description:
StormTech's fleece-lined water resistant jacket has all of the bells and whistles. Lined and zippered pockets, an internal cell phone pocket, velcro closures at the cuffs, and an elastic draw cord. This fashionable and functional jacket is adorned with the massively complex, 86,000- stitch Pierre Renard logo. At regular market prices, this embroidery alone would sell for $140! The jacket retails for more than $100 without embroidery. 

We offer this Pierre Wear original at a mere $85 because, when you wear Pierre, you are letting the world know about our little foxy business in Baltimore, MD. 

Sizes XS through XL. 

Go ahead...be a walking advertisement for Pierre Renard and have a really nice jacket to boot!

name: Elevation Dressage Soft-Shell Vest
description:
This soft-shell vest has all of the bells and whistles! Manufactured by the amazing Canadian Sports Apparel Maker, StormTech, this vest boasts a breathable outer shell of 2-ply bonded microfiber, zippered pockets with durable rubber pulls, and an adjustable drawcord at the hem. 

It comes in Ladies sizes XS to XL, and in Birch, Black, Coal, Harvest Pumpkin, Navy, and Red!

name: Custom Embroidered Softshell Vest
description:
This soft-shell vest has all of the bells and whistles! Manufactured by the amazing Canadian Sports Apparel Maker, StormTech, this vest boasts a breathable outer shell of 2-ply bonded microfiber, zippered pockets with durable rubber pulls, and an adjustable drawcord at the hem. 

It comes in Ladies sizes XS to XL, and in Birch, Black, Coal, Harvest Pumpkin, Navy, and Red!

With the C'est Moi Pierre design show, this vest retails for $85. With your own custom embroidery, prices start at $85!

name: Santos Sporthorses Micro-Fleece Lined Jacket
description:
This StormTech water-resistant jacket has the features riders love, including the all-important fleece-lined zippered pockets and velcro-closures at the cuffs. 

The beautiful Santos Sporthorses logo adorns the back in the color of your choice. 

Colors: black, white, cool blue, navy and red

Sizes: XS to XL

name: EOUS Hampton Water-Resistant Jacket
description:
We include the EOUS Hampton Jacket in our rain gear category because it holds up so well to moisture! This amazing soft shell garment will be your favorite to wear to the barn and elsewhere. The fabric is dirt, debris and stain repellant, with a tapered tie waist and button straps on the shoulders. It is machine washable and embroiders great!

It comes in black and navy blue, in sizes XS to XXL. 

With embroidery, this jacket starts at $99.

name: EOUS Adonis Rain Jacket with Custom Embroidery
description:
EOUS of Phoenix, Arizona makes this clever and versatile riding jacket! It is completely waterproof and is breathable as well. The Adonis is multifunctional with a concealed, detachable hood, inner pockets and it has an elongated back with snaps, designed for full coverage while riding. The adjustable elastic cuffs allow you to easily remove the jacket over gloves while mounted, and the two-way front zipper makes riding in this jacket comfortable and safe. 

Unisex sizing XS to XXL. It comes in Black, Charcoal Grey, and Brown.

And...most importantly...this jacket embroiders great! Prices with embroidery start at $99.

name: Saratoga Diamond Knit Dress Sheet with Custom Embroidery
description:
The Saratoga Horseworks Diamond Knit Dress Sheet is the ultimate in stylish ring side apparel. This multi-purpose sheet provides protection from ring side dust while also serving as a post warmup cooler!

This dress cooler is made with Saratoga's superior fit and style! This unique diamond knit material wicks away sweat and moisture causing increased evaporation to cool your horse quickly. A great dress sheet to use after warming up in the schooling ring! Treated with 3M Scotchgard, this material resists stains and can easily be laundered in a home washing machine without loosing its shape or shrinking! The Saratoga Diamond Knit Dress Sheet breathes extremely well and will look great for shows to come!  Available in black, navy blue, hunter green, burgundy & tan.

Piping and embroidery are always an option to ensure your horse will look stylish, while remaining cool. A great alternative to traditional dress sheets that your horse will love!

And of course, Pierre's custom embroidery completes the look!

name: Custom Embroidery on Coolers & Quarter Sheets
description:
If you have a logo or design you would like embroidered on any item--a cooler, quarter sheet, exercise sheet, or blanket--Pierre Renard can make it happen. 

Supply us your logo or design in a JPG format, and we will have it custom digitized for embroidery for a fee ranging from $25 for a simple, small design, to just around $100 for a more elaborate, large design like the Pierre Renard logo you see on the sheet in this photo. If you are ordering a number of custom items for your clients, we can spread this cost amongst the items being embroidered.  

Once your artwork is in an embroidery format (the most popular is DST), we can embroider that design on virtually any item. Prices are based on the number of stiches in the design. 

Typically, high quality work, using premium materials ranges from $1.50 to $2.00 per 1000 stiches. So, for example, a very elaborate logo such as the Pierre Renard piece in the photo, contains around 80,000 stitches and would cost around $120. A smaller and more simple design, such as embroidery on a saddle pad, should range from $10 to $25. 

If you plan to design a logo for your farm or business, and use it for embroidered items, call or email us for some pointers on how you can create an easily embroiderable design!

name: Saratoga Horseworks Anti-Sweat Sheet
description:
This anti-sweat sheet epitomizes affordable luxury! The revolutionary moisture-wicking fabric, by Saratoga Horseworks of Amsterdam, NY, replaces the old-style Irish knit. Saratoga has cleverly contoured the hind end of the sheet to make contact with the rump! It pulls the moisture off your horse's coat in unmatched speed and style! This amazing fabric, 3M scotch-guarded for stain resistance, is so light and airy that it washes up perfectly in your home washing machine. No muss, no fuss. Most importantly to Pierre, of course, this sheet embroiders perfectly! Try THAT with an Irish knit! Not happening! 

This sheet comes in Black, Burgundy, Navy Blue, Hunter Green, and Tan...with 14 different trim colors! We match the embroidery to the trim, and voi la...an affordable horse garment that looks like a million bucks. 

Thanks to Saratoga Horseworks' spectacular "Made in the USA" products, and their unmatched support of small businesses like Pierre Renard, we can offer this sheet, inclusive of a good bit of embroidery, for $125. Prices vary based on the embroidery stitch count, but the base price makes this item an amazing value. 

Call us at 443-418-0912 to order!

name: Custom Embroidered Team Saddle Pad
description:
Show teams, associations, pony clubs...show your solidarity and team spirit with matching custom embroidered saddle pads! 

Supply your own design, or we will design one for you. 

These are show-quality pads in either dressage or all purpose sizes, and they start at just $49 with embroidery!

name: Elevation Dressage Saddle Pad
description: One of the prettiest logos we've run across, the Elevation Dressage image belongs to dressage professional Dominique "Nicki" Carson of Maryland. We are thrilled to offer this design on a show-quality Perri's dressage pad. Customize the color as you please!

name: Santos Sporthorses Saddle Pad
description:
Perri's show quality saddle pad custom embroidered with the Nuno Santos Sporthorses logo. The gorgeous logo was designed by Katie Tolbert! 

All Purpose or Dressage

name: Sunset Hill Farm Saddle Pad
description:
This saddle pad, custom embroidered with the beautiful Sunset Hill Farm logo, is available in all purpose or dressage. These are white, quilted show quality pads. 

Add your name or your horse's name on the off side for an additional $10.

name: The Best "Horsonalized" Saddle Pad
description:
There's nothing better than a really nice show pad...or is there? Perhaps a really nice show pad that is "horsonalized" with your horse's name, and "personalized" with yours? Or with your farm or sponsor logo?

We start with Perri's gorgeous, high quality, quilted show pads. They come in all purpose and dressage sizes. 

Then, we design the embroidery just for your horse and you. If you have an idea about color, font, and placement, just let us know. And if not, let's talk about it. 

Give Pierre some insight into you and your horse's unique qualities and experience, and he will take it from there. As we all know, each horse is an individual, and each rider is too. But together, each horse and rider combination has something special. And that' what we will hope to capture in designing these special show pads just for you. 

Yes, you can order a monogrammed pad from the big stores on-line...but custom embroidery is a whole different deal. And it's a lot of fun. 

Let us get to know you...we will enjoy doing a unique design just for you and your competition partner!

These pads will start at about $40 and will go up based on stitch count in the embroidery.

name: "Champion" Saddle Pad
description: Saddle pads make great awards and momentos for horse shows, clinics, and other events. We can embroider them with the show or event name only, to give as a general prize or sell as a fundraiser. Or, pads can be specifically designed to acknowledge the winner of a particular class or division, a high point score, or a breed award. We use only show quality pads, and can tailor the design to just about any specifications! Prices will vary based on quantity ordered and stitch count of the embroidered design, but generally speaking these pads should retail for around $35.

name: Cavallo Show Team Saddle Pad
description:
This is a white, show quality all purpose cotton saddle pad custom embroidered with the beautiful Cavallo Show Team logo in burgundy. 

Add your name or your horse's name on the off side for an additional $10. Fill out the contact information form with name information, or call us at (443) 418-0912 to discuss.

name: Cavallo Logo All Purpose Saddle Pad
description:
100 percent cotton all purpose pad made by Dover, with the Cavallo Farm logo embroidered on the left side. 

We can add your name or your horse's name to the design for an additional $10.00. Just select the "Cavallo Logo Pad with Addl Name" button from the drop down menu before you check out.

options.name: Cavallo Logo Pad with Addl Name

name: The "C'est Moi, Pierre" Saddle Pad
description:
Everyone has to come out of his shell now and then, and Pierre Renard is no different. Here is our well-dressed, French fox enjoying his freedom from his usual oval logo...it's just Pierre on a crisp, white saddle pad! 

We are offering this show quality Perri's saddle pad at an amazing price--just $27! Why? Because we think Pierre is cute, and we love "free" advertising! 

And, keep in mind that, when you order a saddle pad with your own design or logo, we will happily add this "C'est Moi, Pierre" design on the off side for a mere $5. This will save you from having to answer all those people asking "Hey, where did you get that cool saddle pad?"

name: Custom Embroidered Saratoga Turnout Boot Storage Bag
description:
This brilliant bag loads from the top with an opening large enough to easily insert turnout boots and polo wraps. Its tough mesh front allows air to circulate so your damp boots and wraps are ready for use again tomorrow. The top flap closes securely so that dirt and hay stay out! The unique Hook & Loop fasteners at the back hold the bag securely on blanket or stall bars. 

The flap lends itself to a simple monogram or name. With a simple monogram, this bag starts at $30.

Available in black only. Measures 11" x 12" x 3"

name: Saratoga Deluxe Stallfront Storage Bag--Monogrammed
description:
For the ultimate in easy access storage, Saratoga Horseworks created the Deluxe Stall Front Storage Bag. Designed with a zipper for top loading, the bag holds bulky horse clothes, brushes, sprays, or anything else you can think of.  The zipper helps to ensure that your items stay clean and safe. The side loops hold any size spray bottle or a towel for quick rubdowns. Velcro fasteners hold the bag on stall bars or blanket racks for easy access and convenience, while keeping your barn aisles neat and clean. Available in Black, Hunter Green, Navy, Burgundy, and  Black Watch Plaid. This bag measures 16" x 5" x 22".

Select your color and fill out the contact form so we can contact you about the monogramming. Virtually limitless colors and fonts are available!

name: Saratoga Large Deluxe Stallfront Storage Bag
description:
Saratoga made this bag with blanket storage in mind! It has a zipper across the top for easy loading, and holds everything from blankets, quarter sheets, brushes, sprays, and anything else you can think of. It also includes two side loops to hold spray bottles or towels. Velcro fasteners hold the bag on stall bars or blanket racks for easy access and convenience, while keeping your barn aisles neat and clean. 

Available in Black, Burgundy, Hunter Green, Navy Blue, and Black Watch Plaid

With custom embroidery or monogramming, these bags start at $45.

20" x 10" x 22"

name: OTTB Pride Polos
description:
Show pride in your Off The Track Thoroughbred with these high quality polo wraps! They feature Pierre's stacked "OTTB" design! 

Polos come in black, white, navy blue, green and purple. Fill out the contact form and specify thread color.

name: Monogrammed Polo Wraps
description:
Saratoga Horseworks Polartec Polo Wraps, set of 4, with your custom monogram.

Polartec is the highest quality fleece on the market. You can feel the difference between Polartec and "cheap fleece." The quality of fleece makes a HUGE difference for embroidery. Polartec is the gold standard and it embroiders well. 

Fill out the contact form or call us to let us know font, color, and style of lettering. 

We can even do a farm logo or a graphic!

Prices start at $36 and depend on the complexity of the monogram and the size of the wrap.

name: Equine Smart Polo
description:
The adorable Equine Smart logo represents the business of well-known animal behaviorist Lauren Bond. This piece of original artwork flows perfectly into a beautiful embroidery design. 

Available in sizes XS to XXL

Colors: White, Navy, Burgundy and Grey

name: Cavallo Show Team Embroidered Polo Shirt
description: This high quality moisture-wicking polo shirt is custom embroidered with the beautiful Cavallo Show Team logo. Available in burgundy or grey, with contrasting embroidery. Ladies polo is a feminine cut. Available in sizes small through extra large. Choose color and size on the dropdown menu below.

name: Santos Sporthorses Cap
description: The beautiful Santos Sporthorses logo adorns this unstructured brushed twill cap in either Navy with white thread or white with gold thread.

name: Custom Embroidered Fly Bonnets
description: Yes, we CAN custom embroider a fly bonnet! These bonnets come in a variety of colors and start at $25. Email or call us with your monogram, horse's name, or logo information and we'll do the rest!

name: Saratoga's Adirondack Rainsheet
description:
Saratoga Horseworks of Amsterdam, NY, manufactures this high quality rain sheet (and ALL of their products) in their upstate NY facility. Yes, everything is Made in the USA. 

The Adirondack Rainsheet is constructed of 430 denier nylon. This garment offers protection from the elements while you wait between classes! Constructed out of our full coverage pattern, the Adirondack Rain Sheet covers from head to tail. Features include two chest buckles to prevent drafts, a brow band, and tail cord.

In black, hunter green, navy blue, burgundy and kelly green. Choose from 14 trim colors!

Call or email us to discuss sizing and embroidery options. 

With embroidery, this rain sheet starts at $90.

name: Saratoga Canine Rain Cover
description:
Saratoga Horseworks' amazing rain sheet design in a smaller format for your canine! This 430 denier nylon shell (no fill) helps keep mans best friend dry during wet weather. Designed for easy donning, the larger breeds coat includes a chest strap, bias surcingles and side release buckles at the surcingles. Smaller dogs have a single clasp at the chest and a belly band that closes with Velcro. Both designs have a full range of adjustments available. 

These sheets embroider fabulously! 

Made in navy, hunter, black, red, kelly & burgundy with your choice of 14 trim colors!!! 

Contact us by email or telephone to discuss sizing and embroidery options. 

With custom embroidery, this rain sheet starts at $35.

name: EOUS "Man's Best Friend" High Neck Winter Rain Rug
description:
EOUS of Phoenix, Arizona, designs this truly innovative High Neck Winter Rug to keep your doggie warm and dry. The neck piece protects your dog from the wind and rain - styled after the unique Madrid Mid-neck Rug. A leash opening on the neck is seal-able around the leash or when not in use. Made out of durable 1800 Denier material that Eous blankets are made of and it is surprisingly soft and flexible. Adjustable heavy duty Velcro chest strap and belly band keeps the rug securely in place. Nylon lined to smooth the hair coat and stay clean.

Custom embroidery available. 

The rug comes in Blue, Grey, Chocolate, and Lavender and in sizes XS to XXL. 

With embroidery, this rug starts at $45. Call or email to discuss embroidery options.

name: EOUS "Man's Best Friend" Rain Sheet
description:
EOUS of Phoenix, Arizona, designs some of the most innovative dog apparel around! 

Wrap your best friend in all-season comfort with the EOUS Dog Rain Sheet. Designed to fit the shape and contour of the dog, this sheet is made of a unique and durable 900 Denier material that has a herringbone pattern or a 1200 Denier Rip-Stop material. A belly band is positioned to stay out of the dog's way provides additional warmth and keeps the rug securely in place. It is adjustable both around the neck and across the body with heavy duty Velcro - with no metal parts to weight down the sheet. Nylon lined to smooth the hair coat and stay clean. Machine washable, and of course, embroiderable too!

Comes in green, eggplant, navy and black in sizes XS to XXL. 

This rain sheet, with embroidery, starts at $35.

Please call or email to discuss embroidery options.

name: Saratoga Summer Turnout Fly Sheet with Embroidery
description:
Keep your horse protected from insects and sun with Saratoga's Summer Turnout Sheet. The material is soft, yet durable, interlock woven mesh. It is absorbent and wicks away sweat from the horse, allowing moisture to evaporate at a faster rate while providing excellent bug protection for your horse.    

Saratoga's invisible shoulder gussets prevent rubbing on the shoulders. The sheet also features double chest buckles, single surcingle, and turnout style leg straps.  

Available in white with choice of 14 trim colors. 

It retails for $69, and with simple embroidery it is a bargain at $79.

name: Monogrammed Saratoga Tack Tote
description:
The Saratoga Tack Tote is designed to carry all the stuff that doesn't have another home! Wrap around handles for added strength. Black, Burgundy, or Black Watch. 17 x 17 x 3 1/2 

Choose your color and then fill out the contact form so we can get in touch with you about monogramming. Virtually limitless fonts and colors available!

name: Pierre Wear Jacket
description:
What can we say? When it comes to the Pierre Renard logo, bigger is even better! This complex and colorful piece of embroidery adorns a fleece-lined softshell jacket with all of the bells and whistles. It has fleece pockets, velcro closures at the wrists, and the all important zippered chest pocket for the cellphone, money and car keys. 

This size of the Pierre Renard logo requires more than 82,000 stitches and takes more than an hour to complete. The embroidery machine says "phew" when it gets done with this one! 

At industry prices, this embroidery alone would cost more than $120, and yet we've priced this jacket--embroidery and all--at just $85 (with free shipping), knowing that if you wear it, people will notice it and remember our name! 

By the way, the gorgeous Pierre Renard logo was designed by the talented graphic artist, Elizabeth Eadie, of Wellmade Design Co. right here in Baltimore, Maryland. We think she's magnifique!

name: Pierre Wear Jacket OR Vest
description: This is a truly amazing 100 percent nylon jacket. The sleeves zip off to make it a vest. It is the perfect mid-weight jacket, and despite it's slightly "puffy" look, it is excellent for embroidery. It absolutely held up to the very demanding Pierre Renard logo on the back! If you'd like to use this particular jacket for your own embroidery design, let us know ASAP, because these jackets are in short supply at the season's end. They are really beautiful, high quality garments. In S M and L. The color is called Birch, but I would call it putty or off white.

name: Pierre Wear Long-Sleeved T
description:
The Pierre Renard logo is the creation of talented Baltimore graphic artist Elizabeth Edie of Wellmade Design Co. Elizabeth sketched the original artwork during our first telephone conversation, and the little, sophisticated French fox of my dreams came to life over the next 10 days. Read more about the process here: http://wellmadedesign.com/small-business/character-illustration-logo/

Digitizing the logo for embroidery required great time and attention to remain loyal to Elizabeth's design. Even scaled down into a small format for shirts, this design requires more than 30,000 stitches, and takes the better part of an hour to produce on our state-of-the-art machine. 

By the industry's pricing scale, this embroidery alone (without the garment) should be priced at $50 to $55. Of course, we've priced it to be much more affordable, because Pierre loves the "free advertising"  aspect of Pierre Wear.

name: Kate Chadderton Logo Columbia Western Trek Fleece Jacket
description:
Pierre Renard has a limited supply of these amazing Columbia fleece jackets with elite eventer Kate Chadderton's custom embroidered logo. 

This massive 7 by 8.5 inch logo requires 35,061 stitches to complete! At industry prices, that is $60 worth of embroidery on a jacket that retails for $75. In other words, it's a good deal!

And yes, in case you were wondering, this jacket IS white. It's not bone, or pumice or birch...it is WHITE. So please take it off before you hose down your muddy horse! White shows off Kate's colorful logo...and we all know you need inspiration to stay clean around the barn. 

This jacket should wash up just great. Columbia says to wash it on a gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. Please NEVER iron it or dry it on high. The backing used to support this complex design won't tolerate high heat. 

We hope you enjoy this very stylish jacket, mate!

name: Digitizing Services
description:
Just about any artwork--photographs, drawings, graphics--can be professionally digitized and put in an appropriate format for embroidery. Embroidery requires a knowledgable digitizer experienced in this area. Pierre Renard contracts with the finest digitizers to produce the highest quality embroidery possible. 

You can reimburse Pierre Renard for custom digitizing services here. Just choose the level of payment by using the drop down menu.

Prices start at $25 for a relatively simple image and increase to $100 for more complex images.

name: Santos Sporthorses Polo
description: This is a stain-fighting 50-50 blend classic pique polo shirt with the lovely Santos Sporthorses logo. In Navy with white thread or white with gold thread. Mens or ladies sizes available.

name: Cavallo Sweatshirt
description: This premium fleece sweatshirt, sporting the classic Cavallo Farm logo, is unbearably warm and comfortable. It's also affordable and quite stylish!
